name: Last Hour
description:
Multiplayer:

Fight in multiplayer on small maps in a team of up to 6 players against other teams for victory in the infamous Team Deathmatch mode or use the shooting range to test your skills. Uses a selection of different modern weapons and equipment.
Earn experience during a match and upgrade your weapons with different attachments and perks.
Fight your way to the top of global rankings.


Singleplayer:

Luther Riggs a marine in the 4th Grenadier Infantry loses a comrade who was also his best friend and his arm during a mission in Iraq. Experience an emotional story in the single-player campaign in which Luther has to come to terms with his past and at the same time his career as a marine is at stake.
Play alone or in co-op.
